pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Potent Vitamin A Ampoules 50x 0.3ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors potent vit. A ampoules instantly promote cell renewal with an intensive, high percentage .15% pure clinical retinol treatment. 50 ampoules.

Skin Doctors potent Vit. A ampoules are an encapsulated measured single dose ampoule, protected from air and light. It is an intensive, high percentage .15% pure clinical retinol treatment. Dramatically helps to:Maintain collagen and elastin for firmer, smoother looking skin, while targeting and improving the appearance of deep stubborn wrinkles, uneven skin tone and pigmentationPromote cell renewalStimulate damaged skin cells to return to their normal functionImprove skin tone and clarity for noticeably younger, softer looking skinBenefit the healing of acne skins and scarringRecommended for:All skin types. Caution sensitive skins. Not for use in pregnancy.Aged skin as treatmentYounger skin as preventative

Ingredients

Key Ingredients:0.15% pure clinical retinol - promotes cell renewal in the skin by increasing collagen and elastin production.Cyclopentasiloxane - silicone based skin conditioner, locks in moisture.Dimethicone crosspolymer - silicone based suspending agent. Provides smooth, silky feel and lubricates skin cells.All Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone crosspolymer, C12-15 alkyl benzoate, Methyl methacrylate/glycol dimethacrylate crosspolymer, Polysorbate 20, Retinol, BHT.

Directions

Usage: Face, neck, décolletage. Avoid the under eye area. Process: After cleansing, use one capsule on a dry face, neck and décolletage every morning. Twist or snip capsule neck to open. Apply by lightly tapping serum onto the skin. Best results: Use in morning. Use in conjunction with other Skin Doctors™ treatments and Skin Doctors™ SPF protection during the day.
